basics.name: Dorian Bayart
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am permanently looking for challenges by acquiring additional technical knowledge, playing with new technologies, being curious and trying to improve myself, with a DevOps oriented mindset.

work.summary: Working on Evidian Identity-as-a-Service (IDaaS), a new product of the Evidian IAM Suite used by hundreds of companies around the world, built to manage Identities (users' rights, lifecycles, accesses, etc.) directly from the Cloud.* UX / UI design* Front-End developments (Angular 8+)* Continuous integration (Jenkins)

Working on new Online Banking customer services (Live account balance, International transfer, DSP2, etc.) for more than 12 million users.* WebServices design / development / optimization* Fullstack developments (Java / Backbone.js)* Continuous integration (Jenkins)* Git maintainer of the Team* Releaser* Agile member of the Transfer Feature Team

Rework on the Enedis (french electricity grid operator) information system, to integrate new customer services for the Linky communicating meter.* Non-regression tests development and automation (Selenium / SoapUI)* WebServices design / development / correction / optimization (Java)* Functional testing support* Technical environments maintainer* Production technical support* Team management / Scrum Master (12+ people)

personnal projects.name: DexPairs.xyz
personnal projects.description: Track prices of hundreds of tokens on multiple blockchains through multiple protocols. Explore Portfolio, search for transactions, and display NFTs as a gallery.>Supports Ethereum, Polygon, BSC, Fantom and xDai chains.
